programme.title: PL STORIES EP51: CHAMPIONS SPECIAL
programme.sub-title: Season 2023 - 2024 has arguably been the greatest since the birth of the Premier League in 1992. Three elite teams racing to the finish line. Each of them believing this season will end in glory. The script of the story is captivating. Manchester City going for an historic fourth consecutive Premier League title. Arsenal looking for their first title in twenty years following their late season collapse in 2023. Liverpool looking to give their manager Jurgen Klopp the perfect send off as he says good-bye to Anfield after nine years. With the help of leading celebrity fans, the managers and senior players each twist and turn of the season is highlighted. The narrative of the season is like no other. The Champions Story 2023 - 2024 tells a very special story.
